doom.driver: OpenAI and Anthropic's rivalry on display as CEOs don't hold hands at India AI summit. OpenAI's Sam Altman and Anthropic's Dario Amodei had an awkward moment at a major AI summit, with the two CEOs of competing AI giants opting not to link hands.
doom.blurb: AI RACE FRACTURES: NO KUMBAYA MOMENT
doom.summary: The Iran military buildup continues to simmer at roughly the same temperature as yesterday, maintaining that carrier-group-in-the-Gulf vibe. Meanwhile, the leading AI safety company and the leading AI capabilities company can't even fake unity at a photo op, which is the kind of coordination failure that keeps alignment researchers up at night. When your best hope for responsible AI development involves two feuding billionaires, maybe recalibrate your expectations.

factors.name: AI Capability
factors.detail: OpenAI and Anthropic's public rivalry signals the competitive race dynamics that historically precede safety shortcuts.

factors.name: Governance
factors.detail: ICE enforcement creating campus disruptions demonstrates continued institutional strain, but remains domestic policy churn.

factors.name: Geopolitics
factors.detail: Iran standoff persists with carrier groups deployed and strike windows open, though no new escalation today.

factors.name: Alignment
factors.detail: Lack of coordination between major AI labs undermines any pretense of unified approach to existential risk management.

factors.name: Wild Card
factors.detail: No unexpected developments disrupting baseline threat calculations today.

dawn.driver: OpenAI and Anthropic's rivalry on display as CEOs don't hold hands at India AI summit.
dawn.blurb: AI LEADERS UNITE AT GLOBAL SUMMIT
dawn.summary: Despite competitive tensions, the world's leading AI companies gathered together at India's major AI summit—a powerful signal of global cooperation on humanity's most transformative technology. Even rivals showing up to the same table represents progress when the stakes are this high. The fact that not holding hands is newsworthy shows how much we expect unity in this crucial moment.

factors.name: Science
factors.detail: Major AI summit brings together cutting-edge research leaders to shape technology's future.

factors.name: Cooperation
factors.detail: Competing AI giants attending same international forum demonstrates commitment to dialogue.

factors.name: Human Spirit
factors.detail: University community prioritizes student safety and wellbeing in immediate response to concerns.

factors.name: Environment
factors.detail: International summits continue building frameworks for responsible technology development.

factors.name: Wild Card
factors.detail: India emerging as crucial convening power for global AI governance and collaboration.
